scoring.description: Scores markets by normalizing search volume (higher is better), average CPC (lower is better), and competition index (lower is better) before applying configurable weights.

rationaleLabels.low_cpc: Normalized CPC (inverted) >= 0.65 (i.e. CPC is well below peers)
rationaleLabels.high_cpc: Normalized CPC (inverted) <= 0.35 (i.e. CPC is materially above peers)
